full_summary:
## Government Tender Announcement

### Industrial Sized (Multi-Use) Shredder [W6795-23BM05]

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) is seeking a vendor to supply a industrial sized (multi-use) shredder to the Department of National Defence(DND).

### Contract Information

* **Contract Reference Number:** WS3694179706-Doc3694870951
* **Amendment Number:** 6
* **Solicitation Number:** WS3694179706
* **Publication Date:** 2022-11-01
* **Tender Closing Date:** 2022-12-06T14:00:00 EST
* **Expected Contract Start Date:** 2022-12-23
* **Expected Contract End Date:** 2023-05-31

### Tender Status

The tender is expired and closed.

### Product Description

The Department of National Defence (DND) is seeking a industrial sized (multi-use) shredder to meet the divestment and disposal needs of the units, including the annual lifecycle of out of warranty and/or obsolete material.

### Trade Agreements

This tender is open to vendors who are registered under the following trade agreements:

* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

### Delivery Zones

* Ontario (except NCR)

### Contact Information

Please contact Shamael Malko-Moore at:

Email: <shamael.malko-moore@tpsgc-pwgsc.gca>

Phone: N/A
